DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study aim evaluate effectiveness epidural injection ropivacaine relief pain patient undergoing laminectomy . Total 60 patient randomized one two group ( groupC groupI ) base Excel number generation . Patients group C receive medication intraoperatively , patient group I receive epidural injection 0.1 % ropivacaine 10ml skin incision . Visual analogue scale pain score , fentanyl consumption frequency patient push button ( FPB ) patient-controlled analgesia system record 4,12,24,48 hour postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: A Preemptive Epidural Ropivacaine Postoperative Pain Relief Degenerative Lumbar Spine Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Patients group I receive 0.1 % ropivacaine 10 ml skin incision guide C-arm .
DOC.criteria: laminectomy r/o infection reoperation mental change allergy local anesthetic
